mapper.select: SELECT * FROM board ORDER BY board_id ASC

SELECT A.*, B.user_name AS creator_name, B.user_tel AS creator_tel, B.user_address AS creator_address, B.detail_address AS creator_detail_address, C.address_zipcode AS creator_address_zipcode FROM board A LEFT OUTER JOIN user B ON A.write_id = B.user_id LEFT OUTER JOIN address C ON B.user_address = C.address WHERE A.board_id = #{id}

SELECT A.*, B.user_name AS editor_name, B.user_tel AS editor_tel, B.user_address AS editor_address, B.detail_address AS editor_detail_address, C.address_zipcode AS editor_address_zipcode FROM board A LEFT OUTER JOIN user B ON A.modify_id = B.user_id LEFT OUTER JOIN address C ON B.user_address = C.address WHERE A.board_id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board ( board_title, board_contents, write_id, write_date ) VALUES ( #{boardObj.boardTitle}, #{boardObj.boardContents}, #{boardObj.writeId}, #{boardObj.writeDate} )
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET board_title = #{boardObj.boardTitle}, board_contents = #{boardObj.boardContents}, modify_id = #{boardObj.modifyId}, modify_date = #{boardObj.modifyDate} WHERE board_id = #{id}
